original_text: Haman sent copies of his command to every region, so that it would be read aloud to the people. Everyone would know what the law said, and everyone would be ready on the right day.
korean_text: 이 명령을 각 지방에 전하기 위하여 조서의 초본을 모든 민족에게 선포하여 그 날을 위하여 준비하게 하라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Haman sent copies of his command
so that it would be read aloud to the people
Everyone would know what the law said
sentences.korean_translation: 모두가 법이 무엇이라고 말하는지 알게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and everyone would be ready on the right day
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모두가 올바른 날에 준비될 것입니다
